examples.question: The most important sign of the significance of renal artery stenosis on an angiogram is?
choices: A systolic pressure gradient >20 mmHg across the lesion
Post stenotic dilatation of the renal artery

examples.question: Ghon’s focus lies at?
choices: Sub pleural caseous lesions in right upper lobe
Sub pleural caseous lesions in left upper lobe
examples.answer_text: Sub pleural caesous lesion in right upper lobe?

examples.question: True about Mooren’s ulcer?
choices: Bilateral in the majority of cases

examples.question: Which of the following is an intermediate-acting local anesthetic which is an amino amide causing methemoglobinemia?
